```{r}
# ex1.02.R
set.seed(123)
n <- 10000
beta <- 1
K <- 1
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- sapply(x, function(x) max(0, K-exp(beta*x)))
# the true value
K*pnorm(log(K)/beta)-exp(beta^2/2)*pnorm(log(K)/beta-beta)
```

```{r}
t.test(y[1:100])
```

```{r}
t.test(y[1:1000])
```

```{r}
t.test(y)
```

```{r}
# ex1.03.R
n <- 10000
beta <-1
K <- 1
x <- rexp(n,rate=0.5)
h <- function(x) (max(0,1-exp(beta*sqrt(x)))+max(0,1-exp(-beta*sqrt(x))))/sqrt(2*pi*x)
y <- sapply(x, h)

# the true value
K*pnorm(log(K)/beta)-exp(beta^2/2)*pnorm(log(K)/beta-beta)
```

```{r}
t.test(y[1:100])
```

```{r}
t.test(y[1:1000])
```

```{r}
t.test(y)
```
